translations: 完美典范，尽善尽美的人（或物）；（100克拉以上的）无暇钻石

sentences.sentence: I make no claim to be a paragon.
sentences.translation: 我没有说过自己是完人。

sentences.sentence: She was certainly no paragon of virtue !
sentences.translation: 她决不是道德高尚的典范！

sentences.sentence: He wasn't the paragon of virtue she had expected.
sentences.translation: 他不是她想象中的那种美德典范。
